name: Zintrick
overview:
Enter the world of fame, wealth, and glory and battle other tournament participants from all four corners of the world in Zintrick! Join the Zintrick puzzle tournament and beat all the world’s Zintrick masters and reign victorious

Zintrick or also known as Oshidashi Zentrix is a classic Neo Geo puzzle game developed and published back in 1996. The game is comparable to a sideways version of Tetris or Columns. In this game, players hurl a pair of coloured blobs and match them with the others to make them vanish. The objective of the game is to be the last one standing. Fill your enemy’s side of the screen with blob and prevent your enemy from doing the same to you. The game features a dozen character from Demi-Gods, Ninjas, and Valkyries.
